original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘jalūkāya ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena jalūkāya ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti yam vadesi katamam tam ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, jalūkā yattha allīyati, tattheva daḷhaṁ allīyitvā ruhiraṁ pivati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja jalūkā yattha allīyati tatthā iva daḷham allīyitvā ruhiram pivati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yasmiṁ ārammaṇe cittaṁ allīyati, taṁ ārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena yasmin ārammaṇe cittam allīyati tam ārammaṇa

original: vaṇṇato ca saṇṭhānato ca disato ca okāsato ca paricchedato ca liṅgato ca nimittato
analyzed: vaṇṇato ca saṇṭhānato ca disataḥ ca okāsataḥ ca paricchedataḥ ca liṅgataḥ ca nimittato

original: ca daḷhaṁ patiṭṭhāpetvā tenevārammaṇena vimuttirasamasecanakaṁ pātabbaṁ.
analyzed: ca daḷham patiṭṭhāpetvā tena iva ārammaṇena vimutti rasama secanakam

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, jalūkāya ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja jalūkāya ekam aṅgam
